group_1.narration: (I went to the beach with Emiri and friends.)

group_1.textCenter: Heh heh heh...@Finally the time has come!
The day I will be called the Dynamite@Queen of the Beach!
I've already got the fifteen centimeter@platform sandals I ordered by mail...
All I need now is to go buy a daring@and gorgeous swimsuit...!

group_1.textLeft: Woah! All the customers here@are beautiful babes?!

group_1.textRight: Heh… Maybe you're all a little too@young for this store?

group_1.textLeft: My, hello there little miss!@Are you in elementary school?
We have plenty of kid's swimsuits@over there!

group_1.textRight: Who are you calling a kid?!
…It seems like Senpai is going to take@a while to pick out a swimsuit.

group_1.textLeft: Me too… There are so many…@I can't pick… I think.

group_1.textCenter: (I won't be able to rely on the salespeople, will I...@It'll be easier if I pick one myself.)
Don't go walking around by yourself!@You'll get lost!!

group_1.textLeft: I told you not to treat me like a little kid!
So, did Ren decide on a swimsuit?

group_1.textRight: Nah, she's leaving the choice to Rikki!
So whatcha been up to, Myako-senpai?@Find a swimsuit that might be good yet?

group_1.textLeft: Heh... I found it all by myself.
A gorgeous swimsuit appropriate for@the Midsummer Dynamite Queen!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]For real?!@[chara:300601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:300601:motion_200][chara:300601:cheek_0][chara:300601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300601:lipSynch_1]Show me, show me!

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh - what do you think of this?!
What's wrong? You got a problem?

group_1.textRight: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...Let's get an employee@to measure your size!

group_1.narration: This product might be a little bit@too big for you, miss.
We've got many cute items in@junior sizes, though.
It may be better for you to pick something@from among those...

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]I can't accept that!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah!

group_1.textLeft: These types of cutesy junior swimsuits...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]...don't do anything to show off my charms!

group_1.textRight: Exactly!
You should wear a school swimsuit and an@innertube instead of one of those extreme ones!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Huh?!

group_1.textRight: I'm not gonna say who,@but someone said this!

group_1.narration: "I feel like Miko-senpai isn't showing herself off@as well as she could.@Like, don't you think she'd look great if she dressed up@like a kindergartner?@Yeah, she totally would!"

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]It was Rika, wasn't it...!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]How?! How did you knooow??!!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]She's the only one who calls me@"Miko-senpai!"

group_1.textRight: I see!! My take on her was TOO good!!!

group_1.textLeft: Don't take Rika's jokes seriously.@She didn't mean that when she said it, y'know?

group_1.textRight: True...! I didn't say it seriously either!

group_1.textLeft: Couldn't you have just made the choice@to not say it at all?

group_1.textRight: Hmmmm.
I was thinking that since you have the tolerance@of an adult, Myaako-senpai, you'd forgive me for it!

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]If that's what you think, then STOP treating me@like a little kid!
...Anyway, my objective is...
The Midsummer Sexy Scientist.
I'm not going to deviate from@that route, got it?!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, well then...
...how about we look for something@that matches your size?

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, that might take@some time...

group_1.textRight: I'll text Rikki and Renki and tell them@to leave without us!

group_1.narration: And with that, the result of searching@the entire store was...

group_1.textRight: Ooooh?!

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh heh... How's this?

group_1.textRight: This...could totally work!

group_1.textLeft: Heh... It's just like I told you.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah! It...
...really captures the feeling of a tiny girl wishing@to grow up that makes you wanna cheer her on!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300351:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]...

group_1.textRight: Miko-senpai sure is late.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...
